alert.note: Alert for Northern Gila County; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 23 at 3:02AM MST until February 24 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST FRIDAY ABOVE 4000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow above 4000 feet. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches with higher amounts near the Mogollon Rim north of Payson. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Areas above 4000 feet near Chino Valley, Paulden, Payson, Pine-Strawberry and Prescott Valley. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Additional snow forecast from 2 AM Today to 8 AM Friday: Chino Valley 2 to 4 inches Paulden 2 to 4 inches Payson 3 to 5 inches Pine-Strawberry 9 to 13 inches Prescott Valley 3 to 5 inches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northern Gila County; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins
